question: What is the name of the Light Utility Helicopter which completed its first flight in Bengaluru?
explanation: The second prototype of the Light Utility Helicopter(LUH PT2) completed its first flight for 22 minutes in Bengaluru. The aircraft is capable of reaching a maximum height of 6.5 Km and can carry a payload of 400 kg. It is being designed to fly 350 km non-stop at a speed of 220 kilometers per hour.
